name: Fortune Teller (EmilyRook)
description:
In this game, you play as a Fortune teller reading cards for your client. But don't worry, you don't need to know the future! In this game, all it takes to satisfy your client's wishes is to make clever observations, pay attention to details and lay out a nice view of the future for your customer.

Game is in choose-your-adventure format, where you can choose your option after each video. Every option has an effect on where the story will go. At the end of the game, the Fortune teller reveals how your services were prized, so aim for the best score! But beware, when you anger the customer, they will leave unexpectedly...

This is school project developed on Charles Engine in three days, just by me. I am open to any critiques and suggestions regarding this game! I marked this version as a prototype, because there is a possibility of making a better version, including

  • sounds and voice acting
  • better illustrations and animations
  • more options!

Thank you so much for playing and leaving a critique!
